fields.name: Stop-In Effect:
fields.value: You may choose whether or not to sell your soul to gain a potential advantage in the game. If you choose to sell your soul, you give up all but $100 of your money and can no longer mortgage properties for the rest of the game. However you also gain ownership of a random full set. If none is available, you gain four random properties instead. You may only sell your soul once per game obvs
